title: Pandemics and Dynamic Capability Development in Multinational Corporations: Language-Based Business Insights

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic business terminology and elementary English reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Combines online modules with offline workshops to study the impact of pandemics on multinational corporations and response strategies, focusing on language and case analysis. Learners develop practical application skills by analyzing corporate reports and news articles.

learning_goals: Learners can explain six uncertainties caused by the pandemic and case studies of multinational corporations' responses.
Learners can analyze corporate crisis management strategies using Dynamic Capabilities theory.
Learners improve language skills to extract and summarize key information from official documents (e.g., websites, reports) of multinational corporations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
